schema.title: Embeddable
schema.description: Configurations for publishing this bundle of ADO components as an embeddable App.

coinDenom.title: Coin Denom
coinDenom.description: Enter the denomination of coin you require buyers to use.

banner.description: Enter a URL pointing at a banner image which will display on your embeddable. Must start with https://
